name: @gjsify/unit
description: A BDD-style testing framework for Gjs

scripts.print:name: echo '@gjsify/unit'
scripts.build: yarn print:name && yarn build:gjsify && yarn run build:types
scripts.build:test: yarn run build:test:gjs && yarn run build:test:node
scripts.test: yarn run print:name && yarn run build && yarn run build:test && yarn run test:node && yarn run test:gjs
